messages.message: I have some UI feedback on the Convo menu. I can’t quite put my finger on, but I wanted to show a good example (loom’s menu)

thanks for the feedback. converse or build's sidebar is really different from a static menu for site navigation (loom), it's closer to the sidebar in chatgpt, or any editing tools where the sidebar shows user created content. the mix of cases, font sizes & font weight is something very subjective & implemented quite differently in different design systems (attach a few other examples).

Yeah I see what you’re saying here, but even within these examples there’s a clearer separation and hierarchy.
Agree its subjective: I’m a ex-Graphic and UX designer so these stand out for me (you can take the art student out of design. but you can’t take design out of the art student)
If I can make a clearer design and you like it, can I share the CSS with you?

please feel free to share any feedback related to design in the <#C03HVPWB7HR|> channel so the team can take a look -- we are very short on design and eng resources right now but feedback is always welcome! no need to share it just with me -- i don't decide the style :slightly_smiling_face:
Perfect will do. I imagine this is low on prioirty list
@Orlando we're refreshing the My hub tab (where we leverage a static menu) and this is an interesting example. We'll take this into consideration!
Ah cool. I actually have more feedback on the situation. Will share a video

So for context, I’ve not used Aihub for a few weeks, so but consider me “new” to Aihub. And this is meant only to inform based on my experience loggin in today to update a app I made yesterday. But: I know what a project is and I know what publishing it as an app means. But I found confusion - Obviously, I can figure it out. But good UX means that I should have to figure it out: https://www.loom.com/share/145d05dec4014b9291e3a54c94a28384

In summary: projects and Apps have a blurred line.
When you’re in MyHub (or project edit mode), you can only click Home. rather than back to MyHub and see the other projects/apps.
